name: Crystal Cavern (TastySnak)
description:
Crystal Cavern

Find your way around 3 different maps, collecting crystals to open gates and activate the exit.

A player can control their movement by pumping the space bar to boost, while attempting to avoid moving obstacles and explosives, and navigating maps with disappearing or moving platforms.

Can you complete each map before the time runs out?

====================

Controls

WASD to move.
SPACE to boost.

====================

Install Instructions

Step 1: Download zipped file.
Step 2: Extract to hard drive.
Step 3: Double click executable to run.
